attributes.action: reject any petition that does not offer "for" and "against" opportunities for signatories.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many petitions and much lobbying is from small groups and do not reflect public opinion. It is impossible therefore to judge whether there is 
indifference or strong opposition to the issue. Any petition which does not give an opportunity to express opposition should be disregarded.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
